thread.section_title: MicksGarage.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MicksGarage.com | www.micksgarage.com
thread.title: Gamani Goonetilleka

author: Gamani Goonetilleka
title: Gamani Goonetilleka
text:
I was searching for two aftermarket smaller wing mirrors for my BMW M135i hatch as I find the standard ones too large and sited at a point where it blocks my vision to the right. I am short and this compounds this issue too. I damage my wheel rims often as I course too close to roundabout edges etc. However even though Mick's Garage could not source them for me Laura's help was tremendous and she has gone out of her way simply to apologise for noit having what i was looking for and to help me try and get what i am looking for elsewhere. I believe Laura is a tremendous asset to your firm and I am very grateful to her for the help I have received so far. Thank YOU Laura! With kind regards
Gamani
NSW
Australia.
